api_list.name: initConfig v2
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/publicApi/v2/initConfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description:

https://rapidapi.com/tvu-networks-tvu-networks-default/api/partyline

api_list.name: Get Auido Track
Task Info
api_list.description:
Get event info by Audio Mixer task ids

**URL path Parameter:** 

|  param | require   | type  |description |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | 
|  taskIds |  yes  |  string | task ids connected by "," |

api_list.name: Get Running Task Ids
api_list.description: Get all running AM task ids, Limit 100
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/am/getRunningTaskIds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Setting List
api_list.description:
Get user setting list

**Response:** 

> attention: the result is json object

| **param**  | **require** | **type** |                      **description**                       |
| :--------: | :---------: | :------: | :--------------------------------------------------------: |
| maxBitrate |     No      |  int  | if it is null , you should get default value from media-service. |
| cloudProxy |     No      |  boolean  | cloud proxy open/close. |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/userSetting/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
